5#ifndef V8_HEAP_MEMORY_CHUNK_LAYOUT_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_MEMORY_CHUNK_LAYOUT_H_
7
8#include "src/base/platform/mutex.h"
9#include "src/common/globals.h"
10#include "src/heap/base/active-system-pages.h"
11#include "src/heap/list.h"
12#include "src/heap/marking.h"
13#include "src/heap/progress-bar.h"
14#include "src/heap/slot-set.h"
15
16namespace v8 {
17namespace internal {
18
19class MarkingBitmap;
20class FreeListCategory;
21class Heap;
22class TypedSlotsSet;
23class SlotSet;
24class MemoryChunkMetadata;
25
26enum RememberedSetType {
27 OLD_TO_NEW,
28 OLD_TO_NEW_BACKGROUND,
29 OLD_TO_OLD,
30 OLD_TO_SHARED,
31 OLD_TO_CODE,
32 TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED,
33 SURVIVOR_TO_EXTERNAL_POINTER,
34 NUMBER_OF_REMEMBERED_SET_TYPES
35};
36
37using ActiveSystemPages = ::heap::base::ActiveSystemPages;
38
39class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE MemoryChunkLayout {
40 public:
41 static constexpr int kNumSets = NUMBER_OF_REMEMBERED_SET_TYPES;
42 static constexpr int kNumTypes =
43 static_cast<int>(ExternalBackingStoreType::kNumValues);
44 static constexpr int kMemoryChunkAlignment = sizeof(size_t);
45#define FIELD(Type, Name) \
46 k##Name##Offset, k##Name##End = k##Name##Offset + sizeof(Type) - 1
47 enum Header {
48 FIELD(uintptr_t, Flags),
49#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
50 FIELD(uint32_t, MetadataIndex),
51#else
52 FIELD(MemoryChunkMetadata*, Metadata),
53#endif
54 kEndOfMetadataPointer,
55 kMemoryChunkHeaderSize =
56 kEndOfMetadataPointer +
57 ((kEndOfMetadataPointer % kMemoryChunkAlignment) == 0
58 ? 0
59 : kMemoryChunkAlignment -
60 (kEndOfMetadataPointer % kMemoryChunkAlignment)),
61 };
62 // Note that the order of the fields is performance sensitive. Often accessed
63 // fields should be on the same cache line.
64 enum Metadata {
65 // MemoryChunkMetadata fields:
66 FIELD(VirtualMemory, Reservation),
67 FIELD(size_t, AllocatedBytes),
68 FIELD(size_t, WastedMemory),
69 FIELD(std::atomic<intptr_t>, HighWaterMark),
70 FIELD(size_t, Size),
71 FIELD(Address, AreaEnd),
72 FIELD(Heap*, Heap),
73 FIELD(Address, AreaStart),
74 FIELD(Address, Owner),
75 // MutablePageMetadata fields:
76 FIELD(SlotSet* [kNumSets], SlotSet),
77 FIELD(TypedSlotsSet* [kNumSets], TypedSlotSet),
78 FIELD(ProgressBar, ProgressBar),
79 FIELD(std::atomic<intptr_t>, LiveByteCount),
80 FIELD(base::Mutex*, Mutex),
81 FIELD(base::SharedMutex*, SharedMutex),
82 FIELD(base::Mutex*, PageProtectionChangeMutex),
83 FIELD(std::atomic<intptr_t>, ConcurrentSweeping),
84 FIELD(std::atomic<size_t>[kNumTypes], ExternalBackingStoreBytes),
85 FIELD(heap::ListNode<MutablePageMetadata>, ListNode),
86 FIELD(FreeListCategory**, Categories),
87 FIELD(PossiblyEmptyBuckets, PossiblyEmptyBuckets),
88 FIELD(ActiveSystemPages*, ActiveSystemPages),
89 FIELD(size_t, AllocatedLabSize),
90 FIELD(size_t, AgeInNewSpace),
91 FIELD(MarkingBitmap, MarkingBitmap),
92 kEndOfMarkingBitmap,
93 kMutablePageMetadataStart = kSlotSetOffset,
94 kMemoryChunkMetadataSize = kMutablePageMetadataStart,
95 kMutablePageMetadataSize =
96 kEndOfMarkingBitmap +
97 ((kEndOfMarkingBitmap % kMemoryChunkAlignment) == 0
98 ? 0
99 : kMemoryChunkAlignment -
100 (kEndOfMarkingBitmap % kMemoryChunkAlignment)),
101 };
102#undef FIELD
103
104 // Code pages have padding on the first page for code alignment, so the
105 // ObjectStartOffset will not be page aligned.
106 static intptr_t ObjectStartOffsetInCodePage();
107 static size_t AllocatableMemoryInCodePage();
108 static size_t ObjectStartOffsetInDataPage();
109 static size_t AllocatableMemoryInDataPage();
110 static intptr_t ObjectStartOffsetInReadOnlyPage();
111 static size_t AllocatableMemoryInReadOnlyPage();
112 static size_t ObjectStartOffsetInMemoryChunk(AllocationSpace space);
113 static size_t AllocatableMemoryInMemoryChunk(AllocationSpace space);
114
115 static int MaxRegularCodeObjectSize();
116
117 static_assert(kMemoryChunkHeaderSize % alignof(size_t) == 0);
118};
119
120} // namespace internal
121} // namespace v8
122
123#endif // V8_HEAP_MEMORY_CHUNK_LAYOUT_H_
